title: Superpowers Are Everywhere, Did I Become The King Of The Sea?
alternative_title: Did I Become the King of the Sea? ; Superpowers Are Everywhere ; Superpowers Are Everywhere, Did I Become the King of the Sea? ; 超能氾濫，我成了海王？ ; 超能泛滥，我成了海王？
status: Did I Become the King of the Sea? ; Superpowers Are Everywhere ; Superpowers Are Everywhere, Did I Become the King of the Sea? ; 超能氾濫，我成了海王？ ; 超能泛滥，我成了海王？
description:
Description :
        For unknown reasons, superpowers begin to run rampant, leading to frequent violent incidents. A boy named 'Xia Yi', who grew up in an island city, feels immense pressure. Fortunately, he also gains a powerful superpower, but this ability seems to have a bit of a "small problem"—it only has strange effects on the opposite sex. However, this does not apply to his childhood friend 'Hao Jie'...
